titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant should be increased to $4,350.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 2/14/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the maximum Pell Grant, for student aid under the Higher Education Act of 1965, should be increased to $4,350.
